document.full_text: south korea's hyundai motor co and the state of alabama will announce on monday an investment at hyundai's alabama plant near montgomery, the company said on sunday.
document.title: hyundai, alabama state to make investment announcement
lines_and_colors: south korea's hyundai motor co and the state of alabama will announce on monday an investment at hyundai's alabama plant near montgomery, the company said on sunday.
